pipian 0.3.0.9000
  • Reference

A mimic of collocate

Source: R/compat-rmecab.R
gbs_collocate.Rd

Create a sparse feature co-occurrence matrix. This function is a shorthand of pipian::gbs_dfm() and then quanteda::fcm().

gbs_collocate(df, pull = "token", n = 1L, sep = "-", what = "fastestword", ...)

Arguments

df

Prettified data.frame of tokens.
pull

Column to be packed into text or ngrams body. Default value is `token`.
n

Integer passed to quanteda::char_ngrams.
sep

Character scalar internally used as the concatenator of ngrams inside quanteda::char_ngrams.
what

Character scalar. Which tokenizer to use in quanteda::tokens().
...

Other arguments are passed to quanteda::tokens().

Value

quanteda fcm object

See also

Other gibasa: gbs_as_tokens(), gbs_c(), gbs_dfm(), gbs_freq()
